metadata.name: #inktober 2k22 no. 01
metadata.description:
No. 01

#inktober 2022. 31 days. 31 drawings. 31 1/1s.

For me reducing is one of the hardest things in art. I decided to participate in #inktober 2022 with this series of minimal (at least for me) drawings and try to train myself in reducing the amount of linework I use for every single one of these pieces.

Thank you for supporting me.

x Flo
